item.title: Would this work?
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sendMessage("You have been made Moderator by "+playerName+."); c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); kickPlayer("+playerName"); sendMessage("You just made "+command.substring(4)+" a moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Credits to W W E for the idea.
